TestDescription.name: Apache 2.2.14 mod_isapi Dangling Pointer

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]By sending a specially crafted request followed by a reset packet it is possible to trigger a vulnerability in Apache mod_isapi that will unload the target ISAPI module from memory. However function pointers still remain in memory and are called when published ISAPI functions are referenced. This results in a dangling pointer vulnerability.[break][break][navy]Affected Apache versions (up to 2.2.14 on Windows platform).[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Impact: Successful exploitation results in the execution of arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade Apache to the latest version.
